name: project_d
author: denliu
description: The UI5 walkthrough application from scratch using the Walkthrough Tutorial (JavaScript)

scripts.gh-pages-init: mkdir -p gh-pages && cd gh-pages && git init && git remote add origin git@github.com:ashuksu/project_d.git && git branch -m 'gh-pages' && cd ..
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build && cp -a gh-pages/. dist/ && cd dist && git add . -f && git commit -am "Update GH-Pages build $(date +'%F %T')" || true && git push -u origin gh-pages --force && cd ..
